## und debug addr

Convert an address between hex and bech32

### Synopsis

Convert an address between hex encoding and bech32.

Example:
$ und debug addr cosmos1e0jnq2sun3dzjh8p2xq95kk0expwmd7shwjpfg
			

```
und debug addr [address] [flags]
```

### Options

```
  -h, --help   help for addr
```
